org.qcri.rheem.core.plan.rheemplan

Class PlanTraversal

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.qcri.rheem.core.plan.rheemplan.PlanTraversal

  • public class PlanTraversal
extends java.lang.Object
    Traverse a plan. In each instance, every operator will be traversed only once.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  PlanTraversal.Callback
      A callback can be invoked during a plan traversal on each traversed node.
      static interface  PlanTraversal.SimpleCallback
      A callback can be invoked during a plan traversal on each traversed node.

      • downstream

        public static PlanTraversal downstream()
        Returns:
        new instance traverses downstream only (i.e., follows OutputSlots only)

      • upstream

        public static PlanTraversal upstream()
        Returns:
        new instance traverses downstream only (i.e., follows OutputSlots only)

      • traversingHierarchically

        public PlanTraversal traversingHierarchically()
        If this method is invoked, this instance will not treat Subplans and OperatorAlternatives as normal traversed Operators but will rather enter them and traverse their contained Operators.
        Returns:
        this instance

      • traversingFlat

        public PlanTraversal traversingFlat()
        If this method is invoked, this instance will not enter CompositeOperators and instead treat them just the same as ElementaryOperators. This is the default.
        Returns:
        this instance

      • traverse

        public PlanTraversal traverse(java.util.Collection<? extends Operator> operators)
        Traversing as with traverse(Operator, InputSlot, OutputSlot) for every operator.

      • traverse

        public PlanTraversal traverse(java.util.stream.Stream<? extends Operator> operators)
        Traversing as with traverse(Operator, InputSlot, OutputSlot) for every operator.

      • traverse

        public PlanTraversal traverse(Operator operator)
        Traverse the plan by following any connected operators.
        Parameters:
        operator - the start point of the traversal
        Returns:
        this instance

      • traverseFocused

        public PlanTraversal traverseFocused(Operator operator,
                                     java.util.Collection<OutputSlot<?>> focusedSlots)
        Traverses a plan in a focused manner.
        Parameters:
        operator - from that the traversal should be started (will not be traversed itself)
        focusedSlots - OutputSlots of the operator that should be followed
        Returns:
        this instance

        public PlanTraversal traverse(Operator operator,
                              InputSlot<?> fromInputSlot,
                              OutputSlot<?> fromOutputSlot)
        Traverses a plan.
        Parameters:
        operator - from that the traversal should be started
        fromInputSlot - InputSlot of the operator that has been followed
        fromOutputSlot - OutputSlot of the operator that has been followed
        Returns:
        this instance
